Description of incident: A hacker apparently broke into the            computers at Pocono Mountain School District and may have tapped into            confidential information concerning students and their parents. Information            may have included the students' birth dates, Social Security numbers,            student IDs, home phones, and the parents' names, phone numbers and            emergency phone numbers. ''If you see any unauthorized activity, promptly            contract your service provider and or the office of the director of            technology at 570-873-7121, ext. 10151.''
